bartenders.name: Miguel Rodriguez
bartenders.bio: With over 15 years of mixology experience, Miguel creates unforgettable cocktail experiences at the Alchemy Bar.

bartenders.name: Sarah Johnson
bartenders.bio: Sarah's passion for rum and tropical flavors makes her the perfect bartender for RedFrog Rum Bar.
bartenders.schedule: Day and evening shifts, rotating schedule

bartenders.name: James Wilson
bartenders.bio: James brings the party to The Lime & Coconut with his energetic personality and perfectly crafted cocktails.

bartenders.name: Elena Petrova
bartenders.bio: Elena is known for her creative mojito variations and friendly service at Sugarcane Mojito Bar.
bartenders.schedule: Afternoon and evening shifts, 2:00 PM - 10:00 PM

bartenders.name: Patrick O'Malley
bartenders.bio: Patrick brings authentic Irish hospitality to O'Sheehan's with his perfect pours and entertaining stories.
